title: Non-Subterranean Factory Designs
description:
Whether it has AE, TE, CC, BC, and/or RC, you're gonna need GT into your factories. I've seen factories built underground. Rather cliched to have a subterranean factory, with help from a BC Quarry.

Which is why I would like see some factories built on the surface. Assuming you use normal worldgen specs, what are the best designs for factories in your opinion?

replies.body: Fully expandable ones, limiting it to the walls is a bad idea

Of course! But that approach means re-designing the blueprints. How can you annex to a ready-made solution in .pdn or .psd format?

Unless. . . BINGO! Plot your zones for future development! This approach can actually work. Assuming you know how to use Minutor.
